name: Figma Design Team Remote Process
description:
This explains how the Figma Design Team currently works over the course of a given week. It outlines the different meeting types and cadences we have, and does a deeper dive into how we run critiques remotely.


This is an excerpt from a recent webinar on "Remote Critiques" organized by Figma that also featured design critique processes from the HelpScout and ApartmentList design teams.


I'll try to keep this document relatively up to date as our processes evolve. Hope it's helpful or inspiring for your teams to figure out the process that works best for you, particularly in these challenging times.
